collectionMetadata.name: Annual Value and Property Tax by Property Type, Annual
collectionMetadata.description: Number of property assessments, median annual value and property tax collected by property types (HDB, Private Residential, Commercial, Industrial and Others) for Financial Year (FY) 2002 to FY2023.

datasetMetadata.name: Median Annual Value and Property Tax By Type of Private Residential Property
datasetMetadata.description:
* The Annual Value of the property is the estimated annual rent of the property if it were to be let, excluding the rent for furniture, fittings and service charge.
* Property Tax Collection excludes Contribution in-lieu of Property Tax, Compounding Fee and Fees & Licences.

datasetMetadata.name: Annual Value and Property Tax By Property Type
datasetMetadata.description:
* The Annual Value of the property is the estimated annual rent of the property if it were to be let, excluding the rent for furniture, fittings and service charge. 
* Number of cases refers to the number of property assessments. Properties may be assessed individually or collectively as a group.
* Property Tax Collection excludes Contribution in-lieu of Property Tax, Compounding Fee and Fees & Licences.
* Property Type - Others, refers mainly to land but also includes clubs, garages, places of religious worship, etc. Property tax collection was higher in FY2011/12 due to the cessation of the Property Tax Deferral for Land Approved for Development on 21 January 2011 which resulted in the deferred property tax being collected in FY2011/12.

datasetMetadata.name: Median Annual Value and Property Tax By Type of HDB
datasetMetadata.description:
* The Annual Value of the property is the estimated annual rent of the property if it were to be let, excluding the rent for furniture, fittings and service charge. 
* Property Tax Collection excludes Contribution in-lieu of Property Tax, Compounding Fee and Fees & Licences.
